mapper.insert: insert into driver ( driver_name, address, phone_no, is_active, created_date, created_by ) values ( #{driverName}, #{address}, #{phoneNo}, #{isActive}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: update driver set driver_name = #{driverName}, address = #{address}, phone_no = #{phoneNo}, is_active = #{isActive}, changed_date = #{changedDate}, changed_by = #{changedBy} where pk_driver = #{pkDriver}
